MaskingMapplet.name: MPT_JH_MR_DOB_CHAR_MM_DD_YYYY
MaskingMapplet.XmlData: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?><!DOCTYPE POWERMART SYSTEM "powrmart.dtd"><POWERMART CREATION_DATE="09/01/2017 02:30:58" REPOSITORY_VERSION="184.93"><REPOSITORY NAME="tdmdev_96_repo" VERSION="184" CODEPAGE="Latin1" DATABASETYPE="Oracle"><FOLDER NAME="JH_PRJ_RIW" GROUP="" OWNER="velamsi" SHARED="NOTSHARED" DESCRIPTION="" PERMISSIONS="rwx---r--" UUID="29ad307b-e6c9-468d-adff-f89e8af8147f"> <MAPPLET DESCRIPTION ="" ISVALID ="YES" NAME ="MPT_JH_MR_DOB_CHAR_MM_DD_YYYY" OBJECTVERSION ="1" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="INPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Input Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Output Transformation" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="o_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS2" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="NO" TYPE ="Expression" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="c_dob" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="c_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT/OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,1,INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,1)-1)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_mm" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="8" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="IIF(INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,1)+1 = INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,2)-1,SUBSTR(c_dob,INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,1)+1,1),SUBSTR(c_dob,INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,1)+1,2))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_dd" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="8" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="SUBSTR(c_dob,INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,2)+1,length(c_dob)-INSTR(c_dob,'/',1,2))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_yyyy" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="8" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_INTEGER(v_dd)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_dd_int" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_CHAR(DECODE (v_dd_int,01,12,02,11,03,10,04,19,05,18,06,17,07,11,08,12,09,13,10,14,11,15,12,16,13,27,14,28,15,20,16,10,17,11,18,12,19,13,20,11,21,15,22,17,23,19,24,10,25,11,26,13,27,14,28,16,29,18,30,11,31,21,00,00))" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="v_day" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="8" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="v_mm||'/'||v_day||'/'||v_yyyy" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="o_masked_dob_mmddyyyy" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="iif(length(ltrim(rtrim(c_dob)))=0 OR ISNULL(c_dob),c_dob,o_masked_dob_mmddyyyy)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="out_final_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Tracing Level" VALUE ="Normal"/> </TRANSFORMATION> <TRANSFORMATION DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="MPT_JH_MR_DOB_CHAR_MM_DD_YYYY" OBJECTVERSION ="1" REUSABLE ="YES" TYPE ="Mapplet" VERSIONNUMBER ="1"> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" MAPPLETGROUP ="INPUT" NAME ="i_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="INPUT" PRECISION ="10" REF_FIELD ="i_dob" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Input Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" MAPPLETGROUP ="OUTPUT" NAME ="o_masked_dob" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="10" REF_FIELD ="o_masked_dob" REF_INSTANCETYPE ="Output Transformation" SCALE ="0"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Is Active" VALUE ="NO"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Is Partitionable" VALUE ="NO"/> <TABLEATTRIBUTE NAME ="Form Name" VALUE =""/> </TRANSFORMATION> <INSTANCE DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="INPUT" REUSABLE ="NO" TRANSFORMATION_NAME ="INPUT" TRANSFORMATION_TYPE ="Input Transformation" TYPE ="TRANSFORMATION"/> <INSTANCE DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="OUTPUT" REUSABLE ="NO" TRANSFORMATION_NAME ="OUTPUT" TRANSFORMATION_TYPE ="Output Transformation" TYPE ="TRANSFORMATION"/> <INSTANCE DESCRIPTION ="" NAME ="EXPTRANS2" REUSABLE ="NO" TRANSFORMATION_NAME ="EXPTRANS2" TRANSFORMATION_TYPE ="Expression" TYPE ="TRANSFORMATION"/> <CONNECTOR FROMFIELD ="i_dob" FROMINSTANCE ="INPUT" FROMINSTANCETYPE ="Input Transformation" TOFIELD ="c_dob" TOINSTANCE ="EXPTRANS2" TOINSTANCETYPE ="Expression"/> <CONNECTOR FROMFIELD ="out_final_masked_dob" FROMINSTANCE ="EXPTRANS2" FROMINSTANCETYPE ="Expression" TOFIELD ="o_masked_dob" TOINSTANCE ="OUTPUT" TOINSTANCETYPE ="Output Transformation"/> <ERPINFO/> </MAPPLET></FOLDER></REPOSITORY></POWERMART>
